conbody.p: is a software suite which retrieves useful operational information from all systems and creates reports from this data. These reports give you better insights on how the storage systems and their data are being used.

For example, you can detect periods of peak utilization of the systems and verify the corresponding performance statistics. Alternatively, you can identify the buckets with the largest number of files, or highest used storage capacity.
In addition, analyzes the ingested data and is able to correlate two events with each other.
The analysis of the data informs you of possible issues and gives you the opportunity to proactively intervene and avoid downtime of the systems.
The content that you see in depends upon your persona; the actions that you may perform depend on your role.
